overview: Romero Santos looks on as Hugh Hunter tells him about all the corroded pipes under the sink, but Romero can only focus on Hugh`s hot ass and crack. Adam is working out when Drew finishes up repairing the bathroom sink and sees Adams` raging hard-on. Drew has another pipe to work on. Brutus returns to his hotel room and finds a leak. Leo arrives and fixes the seal on the door. Brutus thanks Leo by fucking him hard. Pretty boy Brandon can`t get the dishwasher to work, so Daddy Brendan Patrick helps him out as always, fucking him on the kitchen counter.
title: I Need A Plumber
